name: GIGAHERZ
description:
Controls: 

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • LMB to move camera

Dr. Stephen Rackjewiezch* revolutionized organ transplantation. Through injecting a swarm of Nanobots, the Organs themselves are able to move to the patient who needs them the most - and pays the most.

But don't let the hospital staff see you sneaking through the hallways, they try to hold on to their "old", "boring" and "scientifically proved" methods.

*Not a real doctor

A game by 

geno & Lu_Bu

Animations: Mixamo.com

Dieses Spiel wurde im Rahmen des MiniBeansjam4 erstellt.

Themen: Quacksalber, Schmuggel
